    • com.libmailcore.NativeObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Address
extends NativeObject
    RFC 822 address.

        public static Address addressWithRFC822String(java.lang.String rfc822String)

      • addressWithNonEncodedRFC822String

        public static Address addressWithNonEncodedRFC822String(java.lang.String nonEncodedRFC822String)
        Parses a string that contains an address encoded following RFC 822 rules and create a corresponding address. It assumes that the address is not MIME-encoded.

      • addressesWithRFC822String

        public static java.util.List<Address> addressesWithRFC822String(java.lang.String rfc822String)
        Parses a string that contains an addresses encoded following RFC 822 rules and create a corresponding list of addresses.

      • addressesWithNonEncodedRFC822String

        public static java.util.List<Address> addressesWithNonEncodedRFC822String(java.lang.String nonEncodedRFC822String)
        Parses a string that contains an addresses encoded following RFC 822 rules and create a corresponding list of addresses. It assumes that the addresses are not MIME-encoded.

      • RFC822StringForAddresses

        public static java.lang.String RFC822StringForAddresses(java.util.List<Address> addresses)
        Returns the given list of addresses encoded using RFC 822.

      • nonEncodedRFC822StringForAddresses

        public static java.lang.String nonEncodedRFC822StringForAddresses(java.util.List<Address> addresses)
        Returns the given list of addresses encoded using RFC 822. MIME encoding won't be applied.

      • nonEncodedRFC822String

        public java.lang.String nonEncodedRFC822String()
        Returns the address encoded using RFC 822. MIME encoding won't be applied.
